sections.name: The Lonely Warrior
sections.html: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Lawful
traits.text: Lawful effects often manipulate energy from law-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to chaotic divine servants or divine servants of chaotic deities. A creature with this trait is lawful in alignment.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Undead
traits.text: Once living, these creatures were infused after death with negative energy and soul-corrupting evil magic. When reduced to 0 Hit Points, an undead creature is destroyed. Undead creatures are damaged by positive energy, are healed by negative energy, and don't benefit from healing effects.

traits.name: Wight
traits.text: A wight is an undead creature that drains life and stands vigil over its burial site.

gear.name: broken+1 cold iron flaming bastard sword

reactive_abilities.name: Final Spite
reactive_abilities.trigger: The Lonely Warrior is reduced to 0 Hit Points
reactive_abilities.effect: The Lonely Warrior makes a Strike before being destroyed. It doesn't gain any temporary Hit Points from its drain life on this Strike.

ability.name: Cairn Wight Spawn

traits.name: Divine
traits.text: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Necromancy
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the necromancy school of magic, typically involving forces of life and death.

ability.text: A living humanoid slain by the Lonely Warrior's weapon or claw Strike rises as a spawned wight after 1d4 rounds. This spawned wight is under the command of the Lonely Warrior. It doesn't have drain life or cairn wight spawn and is clumsy 2 for as long as it is a spawned wight. If its creator dies, the spawned wight becomes a full-fledged, autonomous cairn wight; it regains its free will, gains drain life and cairn wight spawn, and is no longer clumsy.

ability.name: Drain Life

traits.name: Divine
traits.text: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Necromancy
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the necromancy school of magic, typically involving forces of life and death.

ability.text: When the Lonely Warrior damages a living creature with a melee Strike, using an unarmed attack or its bound weapon, it gains 5 temporary Hit Points, and the creature must succeed at a DC 21 Fortitude save or become drained 1. Further damage dealt by it increases the drained condition value by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of drained 4.

ability.name: Lonely Dirge

traits.name: Auditory
traits.text: Auditory actions and effects rely on sound. An action with the auditory trait can be successfully performed only if the creature using the action can speak or otherwise produce the required sounds. A spell or effect with the auditory trait has its effect only if the target can hear it. This applies only to sound-based parts of the effect, as determined by the GM. This is different from a sonic effect, which still affects targets who can't hear it (such as deaf targets) as long as the effect itself makes sound.

traits.name: Divine
traits.text: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Emotion
traits.text: This effect alters a creature's emotions. Effects with this trait always have the mental trait as well. Creatures with special training or that have mechanical or artificial intelligence are immune to emotion effects.

traits.name: Fear
traits.text: Fear effects evoke the emotion of fear. Effects with this trait always have the mental and emotion traits as well.

traits.name: Mental
traits.text: A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.

traits.name: Necromancy
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the necromancy school of magic, typically involving forces of life and death.

ability.success: The target is stupefied 1 by gnawing pangs of loneliness until the end of its next turn.
ability.failure: The target is stupefied 1 for 1 hour.
ability.critical_failure: The target is stupefied 1 for 24 hours and takes a –2 status penalty to saves against drain life.
ability.text: The Lonely Warrior's funeral dirge is somewhat different from the standard cairn wight dirge: its droning, unnerving chant forces living creatures within 50 feet to attempt a DC 24 Will save. The Lonely Warrior can't chant a new Lonely Dirge for 1d4 rounds.
